long_description: The alpine-ready Granite Gear Leopard A.C. 58 pack offers large, 40-lb. capacity and a rigid suspension system with a comfortable fit. Award-winning AirCurrent suspension features a 3D molded alloy frame, easy torso-length adjustment and padded shoulder straps. Main compartment features a hydration sleeve and port (reservoir sold separately), roll-top closure and a removable floating lid with an internal mesh pocket. Gear organization includes tool loops, external flap with axe cinches and 2 zippered pockets, zippered stretch-woven front pocket and stretch-woven wand pockets. The Granite Gear Leopard A.C. 58 pack is made with 100- and 210-denier high-tenacity Cordura nylon.
short_description: The alpine-ready Granite Gear Leopard A.C. 58 pack offers large, 40-lb. capacity and a rigid suspension system with a comfortable fit.
